item.title: The Problem With Disqus
item.description: Recently I saw on Hacker News a very nice blog post about disqus: it always seemed to me like a shady tool, ubiquitous but at the same time leading to some potential privacy risks. Supun Kavinda’s very nice explanation puts a light to this problem which.
